DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: Can you tell me more about this Hubology Cleansed mentioned?
RESPONSE TEXT: Before the great war, a brilliant writer named Dick Hubbell invented a process for expanding the human mind.
Through the process of alignment he was able to give his followers great mental powers.
I am his direct descendant and keeper of all his secrets, collectively know as Hubology.
If you really are interested in joining us, go speak to Phil about having an alignment.
We can help you find inner peace and happiness. We can help you master the amazing powers of the mind.
DIALOGUE AFTER: Player Default: I'm always for hire if the price is right.

DIALOGUE BEFORE: Player Default: I've already got them.
